title: LittleBlocksMOD卸载后服务器无法开启
author: a945792284
txt_content:
LittleBlocks  SlimevoidLibrary   在单机的时候可以用 放到服务器里也行 但是用笔把方块变成迷你的时候就断开连接了  一直断 只能用MCEDIT把那个方块删掉 这才可以 不过这个mod删除之后服务器显示这个




There are 3 missing blocks and items in this save.
If you continue the missing blocks/items will get removed.
A world backup will be automatically created in your saves directory.

Missing Blocks/Items:
LittleBlocks:lb.littleblocks
LittleBlocks:lb.wand
LittleBlocks:lb.littleblocks


Run the command /fml confirm or or /fml cancel to proceed.
Alternatively start the server with -Dfml.queryResult=confirm or -Dfml.queryResu
lt=cancel to preselect the answer.


删除之后开不了 必须装上才行 没法用删不了 请问如何删除？

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
删掉以后，开服如果显示那个的话，输入
/fml confirm

replies.author: a945792284
replies.txt_content:
Smaoll 发表于 2015-1-17 16:38
删掉以后，开服如果显示那个的话，输入
/fml confirm
是每次开都要输吗？
